name: Avoid renaming or changing attributes on existing projet's Fields (PeopleSoft)
description: This quality rule reports DBField with attributes renamed or changed from original value in Vanilla.
output:
Failed checks give the number of wrongly defined fields.
The associated value is the defined values in the vanilla.
rationale:
As a result of this kind of change, the original value is lost.
So the change cannot be undone.
This type of change must be avoided as it leads to a dead-end.
remediation:
Avoid these types of change.
Reverting back to origin is complex or impossible.
alternativeName: Avoid renaming or changing attributes on existing projet's Fields (PeopleSoft)

technicalCriteria.name: Complexity - Algorithmic and Control Structure Complexity
